scripts.deploy: yarn lint && yarn build && dotenv node deploy && yarn sls:deploy
scripts.test:delete: yarn build && dotenv -- sls invoke local -f mongodbCrud -p test/events/delete.json
scripts.test:get: yarn build && dotenv -- sls invoke local -f mongodbCrud -p test/events/get.json
scripts.test:get-all: yarn build && dotenv -- sls invoke local -f mongodbCrud -p test/events/get-all.json
scripts.test:post: yarn build && dotenv -- sls invoke local -f mongodbCrud -p test/events/post.json
scripts.test:put: yarn build && dotenv -- sls invoke local -f mongodbCrud -p test/events/put.json
